SEARCH
Package project1

Class EventOrganizer

java.lang.Object
project1.EventOrganizer
public class EventOrganizer extends Object
Takes user commands relating to scheduling events on the calendar First checks if user command is valid Contains separate functionality for commands starting with A, R, P, PE, PC, PD, and Q
Author:
Zain Zulfiqar, Nicholas Yim

      private boolean isValidDate(Date date, String dateString)

      Returns:
